name: voiceit-ivr-demo
description: A Demo showing an integration of Twilio's and VoiceIt's API for Voice Biometrics over an IVR System

VOICEIT_DEVELOPER_ID.description: Your VoiceIt developerId obtained from signing up at bit.ly/voiceit-register

VOICEPRINT_PHRASE.description: Your pre-approved voiceprint phrase from VoiceIt, that you want users to use, for example 'Never forget tomorrow is a new day'
VOICEPRINT_PHRASE.value: Never forget tomorrow is a new day

CONTENT_LANGUAGE.description: The content language for the pre-approved voiceprint phrase for example (en-US)
